summary: Own represents the concept of digital ownership and personal control in the online world. It's associated with keeping the web weird, diverse, and user-driven. This idea encourages embracing open-source principles, digital fabrication, and guerrilla-style creativity. It's linked to fostering innovation, preserving internet freedom, and resisting uniformity and corporate control. Own is part of a broader movement to maintain a unique, unconventional, and free web ecosystem where individuals have agency over their digital presence and creations.
excerpt: Keep The Web Weird by engaging with ISOC for internet advocacy, embracing open-source principles, exploring digital fabrication, adopting guerrilla-style creativity, and championing digital ownership. These steps foster innovation and preserve internet freedom.
